Module org.panteleyev.fx
Package org.panteleyev.fx

Class FxFactory

java.lang.Object
org.panteleyev.fx.FxFactory
public final class FxFactory extends Object
This class provides convenience methods to create and configure various JavaFX controls in one method call. Most of the methods take resource bundle and text key as parameters for I18N purposes.
